title: notalim Portfolio
description: A portfolio website showcasing a range of projects with detailed information and interactive features. It includes various sections such as a project gallery, contact information, and integration with external APIs for dynamic content.

title: DAIA: Diabetes Alert System
description: A blood sugar level monitoring system that sends alerts to the contacts's phone when their blood sugar level is too high or too low.

title: Swoons: A Dating Platform
description: A web application facilitating unique dating experiences with a focus on creativity and social interaction.

title: Snoops: A Dog Adoption Platform
description: A platform streamlining the dog adoption process with user-friendly interfaces for adopters and shelters.
